name: Hardest Superheroes With Similar Powers Trivia Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Colossal Boy.

	Marvel's Mr. Fantastic, Marvel's Ms. Marvel and Pixar's Elastigirl all share the ability to stretch, contort and contract their bodies.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Larfleeze.

	DC's Killer Frost and Polar Boy, and Pixar's Frozone all have the ability to generate cold and ice.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Thunder.

	DC's Impulse, and Marvel's Whizzer and Quicksilver are all super speedsters.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Pulsar.

	Marvel's Polaris, and DC's Cosmic Boy and Magenta all have the ability to control and manipulate magnetism.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Bumblebee.

	Marvel's Banshee and Black Bolt, and DC's Black Canary all possess a sonic scream/cry.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Big Barda.

	DC's Atom Smasher, Marvel's Black Goliath, and Hanna-Barbera's Apache Chief (from Super Friends) are all able to grow in size.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Dazzler.

	Marvel's Triton and Namor, and DC's Mera are all water based heroes.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Batman.

	DC's Dawnstar and Man-Bat, and Marvel's Angel all possess wings that allow them to fly.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Kid Flash.

	DC's Green Arrow and Speedy, and Marvel's Hawkeye are all heroes who utilize a bow and arrows.

questions.text: Which of the following heroes does NOT share the same powers as the others in this group?
questions.explanation:
Doctor Manhattan.

	Marvel's Doctor Strange, and DC's Zatanna and Doctor Fate are all heroes with magic/mystic power sets.
